title: Kobold Glider
summaries: The Kobold Glider is only found while the Old One's Army is active, spawning from the Mysterious Portal. It attacks by flying overhead and ramming itself at the Eternia Crystal, exploding on impact. It can also ram itself into players.
Kobold Gliders require 100 kills to be awarded the corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
